rooms.description: Spacious entry area with a reception and seating area to welcome guests. Vastu-aligned orientation for prosperity.
Open-plan space merging dining and living areas, promoting social interaction as per family culture while adhering to spatial harmony.
Functional industrial kitchen designed with modern amenities, placed in the southwest corner as per Vastu for wealth and abundance.
Well-appointed guest bathroom attached to the dining-living area, ensuring privacy and convenience.
Dedicated home office with ample natural light and a quiet environment, located in the northeast corner for knowledge and success.
Serene library/study area designed to serve both as an intellectual retreat and family study space, positioned centrally for balanced energy.
Efficient storage solution with access to plumbing, electrical and maintenance utilities.

openings.description: Large front door aligned east-west axis for auspicious entry. Reinforced with industrial design elements.
Strategically placed windows to ensure ample daylight and ventilation, enhancing the energy flow per Vastu principles.
Large window on the north side providing natural light for concentration. Adheres to industrial aesthetics with a clean glass facade.
High ceiling extraction system integrated with kitchen windows, ensuring proper ventilation and adherence to building norms.
